description: This is a test script for the 'Agent' class from the 'agno' project, testing image input capabilities with the 'Llama' model, including file path and byte content inputs.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of processing prompts and images using a specified model.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image, either loaded from a file path or from raw bytes.

classes.name: Llama
classes.description: A model class representing the Llama language model with specific configurations.

methods.name: test_image_input_file
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to process an image provided via file path and verify the response content.

methods.name: test_image_input_bytes
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to process an image provided via raw bytes and verify the response content.
